captions.text: I am not a morning person.
I'll never get used to this.
The wind. Head wind is the worst.
Right. Ok to the left. Here Jessica left. Right, to the left. Are you with me? To the left.
But you know what my real problem is?

title: What's Your Problem? Sport Doesn't Care - Sochi 2014 Paralympic Winter Games

comments.author: dara meidina

comments.text:
Samsung and its creative agency, 72andSunny, had done great campaigns 
together and produce some ads which IMO were great. Remember the smart 
campaign, "The Next Big Thing Is Here" where they brilliantly mocking Apple 
(and their devoted fans boys)?

This recent ad by Samsung for Sochi 2014 Winter Paralympics is another 
great ad also. In the spot, Samsung and 72andSunny opted to a more real and 
hard stuff direction which somehow reminded me to the similar tone ad by 
Channel 4 - "Meet the Superhumans" for 2012 Paralympic.

Both had their own unique perspective about the athletes. In Samsung's 
case, those Paralympic athletes admits to themselves they had lots of 
problems they want to overcome but their disability doesn't count as one.
#advertising #Samsung #Sochi #Paralympic #72andSunny﻿
